title: Ready to make your dream home come true?

aboutUs.explanation: Camlik Park Residence was build in 2012 by Omer Kuk. He is an engineer and and owner of the ANTALYA ДОМ HOMES Real Estate Company.  He has more than 30 years experience in construction and building houses.

contact.header2: We're ready to lead you into the dream houses in Antalya..
contact.explanation2: We are a Belgian (Financial Controller) & Turkish (Web Designer) couple. We live in Antalya and Belgium. We would like to help you for your questions or concerns about Antalya Дом Homes.

houses.name: Konak Twin Towers
houses.address: Mahmutlar Mah. D-400 highway BLV. No:23A Alanya/Antalya
houses.descrLong: Konak Twin Towers 1 Project consists of a land area of ​​3,751m2. It consists of 2 blocks and 174 flats in the city center of Alanya. 200 mt. to Mahmutlar center, 20 mt. to the beach. is at a distance. It has a position that dominates the sea and the castle view.
houses.commonAreas: Indoor Parking Lot, Doorman, 24 Hour Security, Outdoor Swimming Pool, Indoor Swimming Pool, Fitness, Turkish Bath, Steam Room, Massage Room, Sauna, Pool Bar, Children's Playground, Internet, Satellite System

houses.name: Dream Homes Alanya
houses.descrLong: The Dream Homes Alanya complex is a construction project that spans an area of 1,380 m2 and consists of two blocks. The apartments and balconies of the complex offer breathtaking views of the sea, mountains, and city, thanks to their large windows. The entire complex is beautifully landscaped with a green lawn and decorative trees, adding to its aesthetic appeal.
houses.commonAreas: Garden and playground. Outdoor swimming pool. Fitness. Car park. Security Personnel and 24 hours video surveillance. Central satellite system. Generator. Internet. Elevator.

houses.name: Park Tema Antalya
houses.address: Uncalı, 1255. Sk. No:8, 07070 Bahtılı Köyü Köyü/Konyaaltı/Antalya
houses.descrLong: In the most beautiful location of Konyaaltı, located on a 2.414 m2 area in the center of the city, Park Tema provides a tranquil and new life accompanied by verdant nature with 2 blocks and 41 apartments… Park Tema, presented to you with the latest approach of the completed Park Royal, Park Maya, Park Vega and Park Mira projects will be ready to be live in March 2020 and it will be waiting for you with its 1+1, 2+1, 3+1, and 4+1 duplex apartments.
houses.commonAreas: One vehicle parking lot space for each apartment will be provided. Entrance of the parking lot will be an automatic aluminum door. Automatic pass system will be used for the vehicle entry. Clean water, fire, pool water tanks and pumps will be in the basement. Clean water tank will be made of stainless steel. Central heating cascade system will be in the basement. Children playground designed for the kids will be equipped with a camera-controlled intercom system to be monitored from the apartment.
